question: What is the theme of 2017 International Nurse Day (IND)?
option3: Nursing: A vital resource for health
option4: Nursing: A voice to lead - Achieving the sustainable development goals
answer: Nursing: A voice to lead - Achieving the sustainable development goals
explanation: The International Nurse Day (IND) is observed every year on May 12 across the world to mark the birth anniversary of Florence Nightingale, the founder of modern nursing, and also to mark the contribution of nurses towards the society. The International Council of Nurses (ICN) has chosen  the 2017 theme ‘Nursing: A voice to lead - Achieving the sustainable development goals” to r aise awareness both amongst the nursing profession and the general population and policy makers of what the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) are and why they matter.
